Name: HedgeyeENERGY
Text: Announced last night, $TEGP will acquire $TEP in taxable transaction at no premium.  Another IDR bites the dust.
clean_text: ANNOUNCED LAST NIGHT TEGP WILL ACQUIRE TEP IN TAXABLE TRANSACTION AT NO PREMIUM  ANOTHER IDR BITES THE DUST
